A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi will definitely subvert your expectations of what will happen\, but does so in a good way. It's a real shame that it's divided audiences as much as it has. If Star Wars makes a derivative movie\, people are mad\, yet if it makes an original take\, like The Last Jedi\, people are still mad. Not sure what people want out of this series.
